# Clover Server Rules
## 1. Zero-Tolerance Content - Erotic roleplay (ERP), hate speech, sexual content, and illegal content are strictly prohibited. This is a zero-tolerance rule and will result in a permanent ban. Romance is allowed, provided it does not involve sexual actions or content.
## 2. Escalation and Roleplay - 2.1: All actions are considered in-character and roleplayed. - 2.2: Situations must be escalated or de-escalated appropriately.
## 3. High-Roleplay Environment - 3.1: This is a High Roleplay (HRP) server, Players are expected to put effort into their characters and actions and to be as engaging and interesting as reasonably possible. - 3.2: Doing LRP activities at random is not an interesting RP, do something else.
## 4. Server Safety - Any actions that may put the server at risk of being de-hubbed or de-authed will result in a permanent ban.
## 5. Character Age - Player characters must be 18 years of age or older, Characters younger than 18 are not permitted.
## 6. Language - 6.1: English is the primary language of the server. - 6.2: Exceptions may be made for character accents or gimmicks, provided communication remains clear.
## 7. Out-of-Game Information Do not share round information or in-character events outside of the game, including on Discord.
